attributes.action: Apply pressure to the oil companies and resellers to reduce the cost of petrol to help small businesses survive during the dramatic increase in the price of petrol and huge profits shown by Shell and BP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small Business is being hit hard by the petrol increases that are allowing the main providers (BP and Shell) to walk away with huge quarter profits. Small business require to travel to drum up business and provide vital services to their local communities. We wish the PM to apply some pressure to the Oil companies and the main suppliers to the public to help reduce the cost to the general public and small businesses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
